Many pieces of arable land are together
In the green rice fields on the banks of the river
the lines cross each other fields
many pieces of farmland stick together
in a green rice field on either side of the river
in a green paddy field on both sides of the river
A lot of farmland is gathered
in green rice fields on both sides of the river
In the green rice fields on both sides of the river
many plots of agricultural land are united
many pieces of farms are together
